pizzas.title: Margherita
pizzas.discription: Classic Italian pizza with tomato sauce, mozzarella, and basil.

pizzas.title: Pepperoni
pizzas.discription: Pizza with spicy sliced pepperoni and delicious cheese.

pizzas.title: Hawaiian
pizzas.discription: Combination of pineapple, ham, and cheese sauce for a sweet and savory flavor.

pizzas.title: BBQ Chicken
pizzas.discription: Pizza topped with BBQ chicken, onions, and tasty cheese.

pizzas.title: Supreme
pizzas.discription: Rich pizza loaded with ham, pepperoni, mushrooms, peppers, olives, and more.

pizzas.title: Vegetarian
pizzas.discription: Pizza featuring fresh vegetables like peppers, mushrooms, onions, olives, and cheese.
